name: Market Fight: Get Dressed Up!
description:
Open your way clicking away the rude customers that are all over the place!

In Market Fight: Get Dressed Up! You can choose 2 gaming modes
In the first one, you will se a bit of a story, play a minigame cliching away other customers, and dinally dress up using the money you have collected
In the second one [free mode], you can freely use all the clothes without paying for them, so you can try all the outfits you didn't collect enough money for in the first mode.

To exit the game after the game over in the minigame, press Q.

Credits

Font: Alagard https://www.dafont.com/es/alagard.font?fpp=50&text=1234567890

Music by: Migfus https://opengameart.org/users/migfus20
